text: Jochen Hecht (born June 21, 1977 in Mannheim, West Germany) is a retired ice hockey centre that played a combined 13 seasons in the NHL. He was picked by the St. Louis Blues with the 49th overall pick in the 1995 NHL Entry Draft. Hecht played 2 seasons with the St. Louis Blues, 1 season with the Edmonton Oilers and 10 seasons with the Buffalo Sabres. He also played 5 seasons in the DEL with Adler Mannheim. On April 26, 2013, he announced that he was retiring from professional ice hockey to reporters in the locker room after the Sabres final regular season game against the New York Islanders. ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Buffalo Sabres players Category:Edmonton Oilers players Category:German ice hockey players Category:Sportspeople from Mannheim Category:St. Louis Blues players Category:Worcester IceCats players
